summary: Circa 1861, Angelina, ruling countess of an Italian principality, is at a loss when invaded by a Hungarian army. Her lookalike ancestress Francesca, who saved a similar situation 300 years ... See full summary »
cast: Betty Grable|Douglas Fairbanks Jr.|Cesar Romero|Walter Abel|Reginald Gardiner|Harry Davenport|Virginia Campbell|Whit Bissell|Lester Allen|Mary Bear|David Bond|Harry Carter|Harry Cording|Jack George|Don Haggerty|Joe Haworth|Ray Hyke|Edmund MacDonald|Belle Mitchell|Mayo Newhall|John Parrish|Francis Pierlot|Thayer Roberts|Duke York
title: La dama de armiño
